Internet Remarks: A growing family means the time has come for more space, so this classic, centrally located co-op is now available. The cove ceilings reflect the period of this lovingly maintained suite, along with some modern updates including built in storage, new stainless appliances; solid surface counters; new subway tile back splash and custom window treatments.  A common roof patio is a gathering place in this community oriented building built in 1948, when Streamline Moderne was giving way to Mid Century style.  Sherwood Lodge is a lovely blend of these two architectural influences. The building includes iconic Streamline Moderne details such as the racing strips on the top of the faÃ§ade, chrome capped Juliette balcony, geometric ironwork railings, original black glass tiles and the beautiful interior curved-wood staircase lit by skylights windows.  Cats ok, no dogs.  Public Open:  Sat/Sun Apr. 29/30 2-4pm.
